CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: In Figure 3a , both of the absorption spectra recorded from dilute chloroform solutions display π-π* transitions at around 425 nm and large charge transfer features between 500 and 700 nm which are assigned by analogy to similar polymers , corresponding to intramolecular charge transfer ( ICT ) between the acceptor ( BT / BO ) and donor ( NDT ) units.

Let's think step by step.

Material Name
---
chloroform
BT
BO
NDT

Chloroform is explicitly mentioned as a "dilute chloroform solution" in the paragraph. BT, BO, and NDT are also mentioned as material names, being part of the acceptor and donor units in the polymers.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Material Name
---
chloroform

Chloroform is the only explicit material name mentioned in the paragraph. The other terms (BT, BO, and NDT) are not clearly identified as material names without additional context.
